[bq="SquiggyBomb"]So how has everyone's day been so far?[/bq]
I might have a part time job.


Also I'm working on using my IPL (basically to remove body hair) and no wonder why so few people choose to go through with hair removal cause your choices are to wax and then use a cream multiple times or use a intense laser to essentially burn your hair follicles.  I'm going with IPL cause the thicker your body hair is the worse waxing hurts so imagine waxing your moustache on your face.
